divs: Sighting DetailsSitting outside with family and friends dew too power outage. Lights had came back on at 9:15 PM about 15mins later 9:30 PM my wife said " Look up above the house those lights or stars are moving " when looking I seen about 10 to 20 bright lights, with 15 or more dimmer lights following the first 10 to 20 objects. Multiple smaller lights following in a staggered formation about 6 following after another in a line formation. Could not observe had went behind horizon mountains. Felt confused had to ask others " did we really see that? " reply was " yes we did ". Wife & children were frighten they had gone back inside the house we still didn't know what we seen that night.
Summary: Flew from a NW to SE ( direction ) in stangered multi-light formation.
trends: There have been no other sightings in San Carlos
This sighting has never been favorited.
